description: MainActivity.java is the main entry point for the Android app, managing UI components such as a RecyclerView for notes, a FloatingActionButton to add notes, and a search box for filtering notes. It handles lifecycle events, user interactions (clicks and long-clicks), and communicates with the NoteRepository for data management.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity for the Android notes app, displaying a list of notes, supporting addition, searching, and deletion of notes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components such as RecyclerView, FloatingActionButton, and search EditText, and registers event listeners.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Refreshes the note list when activity resumes.

methods.name: performSearch
methods.description: Filters the list of notes based on the search query.

methods.name: onItemClick
methods.description: Handles click events on a note, opening the detail/edit activity.

methods.name: onItemLongClick
methods.description: Handles long press on a note, prompting for deletion.
